name: Flightpath (itch)
description:
Welcome to Flightpath, a game made by StormFast.

Flightpath is a flight simulation game all about flying a paper airplane in a house, and landing on a yellow platform to go to next level. 

Also check out the official StormFast website:

https://stormfastbiz.weebly.com

And Facebook page:

https://facebook.com/stormfastbiz
